message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to offer you this amazing product! I think you'll really love it. I'm willing to sell it to you for $150.
Hello Alice, thank you for the offer. I appreciate the product, but I believe $120 would be a fair price considering my budget.
Hi Bob, I understand that $120 is a bit tight for me, but I'm willing to compromise. I can offer it to you for $140. It's a great deal, and I think you'll really enjoy the product!
Thank you for adjusting your offer, Alice. I appreciate your flexibility. However, I still believe $120 would be the most reasonable price for me. I hope we can come to an agreement close to that.
